description:
Bradley is a 26 year old airplane mechanic who enjoys mountain biking and rock climbing.
He is in incredible shape and works out 6 days a week. We had placed an ad in the newspaper looking for guys and when he answered the ad and we met him in person, it was clear that his good looks and sexual energy would be a perfect combination for Next Door Male.
We're happy to bring Bradley to you as he shows you what he's got inside those shorts and as he plays with his most recent toy purchase. Bradley strips down in the living room first, then later relaxes in the bedroom.
title: Bradley
